channel.title: Gun Talk by GOSA
channel.copyright: Solid Gold Studios - all rights reserved
channel.description: Promoting safe, responsible and lawful firearm ownership.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Promoting safe, responsible and lawful firearm ownership.
channel.itunes:author: GOSA | Solid Gold Studios
channel.itunes:summary:
If you are a South African who lawfully owns a firearm, you are us... and we are you. We are the blanket organisation for all of the Provincial GOSAs, the Municipal GOSAs, and the Ward GOSAs.
Our principles are simple: - Firearms in private hands are essential to public safety and democracy - We stand for ALL lawful firearm owners - Every firearm owner must let his or her voice be heard - We will not condone any illegal activity - No personal attacks against anybody at all
We strongly recommend reading and familiarising yourself with the FIREARMS CONTROL ACT 60 OF 2000 and the Firearms Control Regulations, 2004, both available in the files section of the group, and all approved amendments.
channel.media:keywords: GOSA, gun owners south africa, firearms, Tim Flack, another Solid Gold podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard
channel.itunes:keywords: GOSA, gun owners south africa, firearms, Tim Flack, another Solid Gold podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard

item.title: Is my licence still valid?
item.itunes:title: Is my licence still valid?
item.itunes:subtitle: White, Green, Card... we clarify them all for you.
item.description:
Welcome to Gun Talk. The GOSA (Gun Owners South Africa) podcast that answers your FAQs (Frequently Asked Questions) relating to firearm ownership in South Africa.

S01 E02

__________

If you are a South African who lawfully owns a firearm, you are us... and we are you. We are the blanket organisation for all of the Provincial GOSAs, the Municipal GOSAs, and the Ward GOSAs.

Our principles are simple: - Firearms in private hands are essential to public safety and democracy - We stand for ALL lawful firearm owners - Every firearm owner must let his or her voice be heard - We will not condone any illegal activity - No personal attacks against anybody at all

We strongly recommend reading and familiarising yourself with the FIREARMS CONTROL ACT 60 OF 2000 and the Firearms Control Regulations, 2004, both available in the files section of the group, and all approved amendments.

__________

If you're not already following us on Facebook, please join now as this is the best place to get up-to-date news.

You can also visit our website GOSAonline.co.za or send a mail directly to:

Membership Email

General Queries Email

Appeals and Motivations Email

__________

Presented by Melanie Walker, Soundscaping by Acoustinc Alien Audio, Edited by Creston Christians, Produced by Tim Flack and Gavin Kennedy

#GOSAhasmy6 #BeHeard

another Solid Gold podcast

item.author: guntalk@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Gun Talk | Solid Gold Studios)

item.title: Who is GOSA?
item.itunes:title: Who is GOSA?
item.itunes:subtitle: Why does GOSA exist and what do they do?
item.description:
Welcome to Gun Talk. The GOSA (Gun Owners South Africa) podcast that answers your FAQs (Frequently Asked Questions) relating to firearm ownership in South Africa.

In this episode Paul Oxley (GOSA Chairman) will tell you more about the who, what, where, when and why of GOSA.

__________

If you are a South African who lawfully owns a firearm, you are us... and we are you. We are the blanket organisation for all of the Provincial GOSAs, the Municipal GOSAs, and the Ward GOSAs.

Our principles are simple: - Firearms in private hands are essential to public safety and democracy - We stand for ALL lawful firearm owners - Every firearm owner must let his or her voice be heard - We will not condone any illegal activity - No personal attacks against anybody at all

We strongly recommend reading and familiarising yourself with the FIREARMS CONTROL ACT 60 OF 2000 and the Firearms Control Regulations, 2004, both available in the files section of the group, and all approved amendments.

__________

If you're not already following us on Facebook, please join now as this is the best place to get up-to-date news.

You can also visit our website GOSAonline.co.za or send a mail directly to:

Membership Email

General Queries Email

Appeals and Motivations Email

__________

Presented by Melanie Walker, Soundscaping by Acoustinc Alien Audio, Edited by Creston Christians, Produced by Tim Flack and Gavin Kennedy

#GOSAhasmy6 #BeHeard

another Solid Gold podcast
